name: Martin Fourcade KBBQ
description:
Prototype Studio Week #5: How do olympians chill out after the Winter Olympics?

Controls are based on PS4 controller but should work with any dual analog gamepad.

I have no idea but this game is a guess

Chopsticks from poly.google.com

Raw steak model from S. Paul Michael over at poly.google.com

The rest were modeled inside Unity with Probuilder
